name: Hondicard
shortDescription: Hondicard is a card-based learning platform with focus on collaboration and free-to-use features.

name: (WIP) Toolbox
shortDescription: Toolbox is a collection of tools, mostly for developers. Among these are a password generator, hash validator, and more.

name: Sorting Algorithms
shortDescription: Sorting Algorithms is an open-source GitHub repository that contains a collection of sorting algorithms, written in Java.

name: TheAlgorithms
shortDescription: TheAlgorithms is an open-source GitHub organization where I contribute frequently, mostly in TypeScript.
